name: Through Abandoned: The Forest
description: You continue your journey in worlds of Abandoned. Welcome to the Forest, the sacral place in the Ordered. Solve puzzles, find items and a way to use them. Try to reach your brother and have fun.If you haven't played Through Abandoned orginal yet: http://store.steampowered.com/app/389270?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7 or latest Processor: 2.33 Ghz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom 1.6 Ghz or faster processor for netbook classes devices Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Will work on integrated videocard Storage: 750 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Great point n click game! Def a game to get when its on a bundle or on sale. The art was really nice and well done! Look forward to part 3!  pros Sounds  Art is amazing Soundtrack puzzles  Cons N/A

If you enjoyed the Submachine Games, this is the game for you. kind of short, but high quality art in it!  It has hard secrets in it. I realy enjoyed it.  the price of 3$ is worth it, compare to other games at that price.

Dotted with hints of lore and brow-furrowing brainteasers, Abandoned 2: The Forest is a worthy successor to the first point-and-click puzzle adventure in the Abandoned series.   I admit I enjoyed the visual aesthetic of the first over the second, however the richer thematic environments of the second had me engrossed nonetheless. Very excited to see how this story unfolds.
